channel.title: ICe BArrage #2
channel.description:
Well, on some servers, when your at a really far distance, you can barrage someone no problem. On mine, when i go to that same distance, and barrage my enemy, my player runs towards them, as if they were attacking normal...
The distance, is maximum 8 squares apart to barrage.
If you are more than 8 squares, it runs to the enemy. How can i change this? that you can barrage from any distance?
NOTE: I am using a handler..

item.title: ICe BArrage #2
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“SWAT, post:11, topic:156882”]Real Rs Barrage :

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] > -94) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 6)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 6)==true)) { if(castOnPlayer.EntangleDelay >= 10) { hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(24); startAnimation(1979); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 1; castOnPlayer.playerGfx(369, 0); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 2); deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } else { castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You are frozen!"); hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(24); startAnimation(1979); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); castOnPlayer.barrage(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 1; castOnPlayer.playerGfx(369, 0); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 2); deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("Your Magic Level Is to low the Cast this spell."); startAnimation(1979); stillgfx(85, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); } } }[/quote]

PMFG!!! WHY DOESN’T ANYONE KNOW WHAT IM TALKING ABOUT!?!?!

Its not to do with the spell!!! It’s to do with like, if(GoodDistance, or if (GoodDistance. … . . . . . . . Tiles away?.. Or w.e…

Im not bothered about how the spell is…

Read full topic

item.title: ICe BArrage #2
item.dc:creator: @SWAT SWAT
item.description:
@SWAT wrote:

Real Rs Barrage :

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] > -94) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 6)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 6)==true)) { if(castOnPlayer.EntangleDelay >= 10) { hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(24); startAnimation(1979); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 1; castOnPlayer.playerGfx(369, 0); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 2); deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } else { castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You are frozen!"); hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(24); startAnimation(1979); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); castOnPlayer.barrage(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 1; castOnPlayer.playerGfx(369, 0); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 2); deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("Your Magic Level Is to low the Cast this spell."); startAnimation(1979); stillgfx(85, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); } } }

item.title: ICe BArrage #2
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Yea i have one…

And i did say, thats not what i wanted…

When i barrage from a REAL big distance, like luring?.. When i see the player appear on the screen, i barrage… And the player runs down… And doesn’t barrage…

Yet when im about 8 squares apart from the oponent, it barrages…

How can i make it so it will barrage from ANY distance…

Read full topic

item.title: ICe BArrage #2
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

spankjava:

why not add a entangel delay lol

Its not about the hold… Look at this pic.

If i barrage them, from that distance, it just runs to them…

If i barrage from a distance like this…

It works… How can i make it so, i can still barrage from any distance, like the first pic?[br][size=1]Posted on: November 05, 2007, 10:22:10 AM[/size][hr][quote=“nwe luigi2, post:7, topic:156882”]you nerver helped me you always pissed me off…[quote author=X-J-K-X link=topic=213982.msg1869880#msg1869880 date=1194296754]
Lol nah i don’t work that way…

I’ve helped tons of people, and i need help with a few things. When my problems are sorted. I start to help other people again :P…
[/quote][/quote]

Rofl i’ve never helped you because i’ve never seen you post. And i’ve spoke to you ONCE. In a pm. So don’t get cocky with me please… If your gonna be like that, leave plz.
